Title: A Window into the Future
Description:
Those lenses are a wondrous integration of technology and arcane artifice. I'm sure we could learn much, and maybe even upgrade my own invention.

But first we'll need to find it. You're a dragonrider, right? Can you fly up and recover the lens?

It's possible the dreadsqualls still have it in one of their nests.
ObjectivesText: Search Dreadsqualls nests to recover the lens.

Objectives.Text: Search Dreadsquall Nests for the Lens
